      • saveData

        public void saveData(Simulation sim)
        Saves the data collected during an iteration of a simulation to an XML file. The file name has the format: "rule[id]-simulation[id]-iteration[id].xml" and is stored in C:\\database\\mcm\\traffic-model\\data\\
        Parameters:
        sim - The current simulation.
        iterationNum - The current iteration number.
